andromeda.why: Refuses coerced conclusions; guards sovereignty over one’s own thinking.

arcturus.why: Builds a clean cognition container—silence, pacing, and iterative review before speaking.

draco.why: Early correctness anxiety can drift into status/gatekeeping around ‘right ideas.’

lyra.why: Focus is mental processing, not aesthetic display.

orion-dark.why: Grabbing rigid formulas to feel safe—doctrine over discovery.

orion-light.why: Micro-ordeal: wait for the authentic insight rather than perform a premature answer.

pleiades.why: Attuned listening softens the field so the idea can mature.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching cognition hygiene; no transmission of law yet.

andromeda.why: Won’t be forced into conclusions on others’ timelines—mental sovereignty.

arcturus.why: Methodical refinement—returns to the thought with better framing and evidence.

draco.why: ‘Proper channels’ for thinking can become permission/rank games.

lyra.why: Clear phrasing and cadence support reception when sharing.

orion-dark.why: Hiding behind procedure to avoid revising beliefs.

orion-light.why: Honorable restraint: share only when the reasoning is ready.

pleiades.why: Relational pacing—checks audience readiness so the insight can land.

sirius.why: Process stewardship without formal instruction yet.

andromeda.why: Refuses mental capture; learns to own a view after trial-and-error loops.

arcturus.why: Timing dysregulation—obsessive rethinking or noisy blurting under pressure.

draco.why: Defensive posturing and correctness policing when challenged.

lyra.why: Finds a cleaner, simpler articulation through iteration.

orion-dark.why: Dogma as a refuge from uncertainty—compliance over inquiry.

orion-light.why: Initiatory grind: revise publicly when facts change; keep returning to truth.

pleiades.why: People-pleasing agreement erodes honest testing of ideas.

sirius.why: Self-forging rationalization; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Standardizing insight is order-making, not chain-breaking.

arcturus.why: Turns raw ‘aha’ into reproducible model—definitions, steps, review loops.

draco.why: Success can invite gatekeeping of who ‘gets’ to reason.

lyra.why: Elegant rhetoric and example make the insight adoptable.

orion-dark.why: Protocol ossification—method treated as unquestionable law.

orion-light.why: Mentor-by-method: others face the ordeal of aligning to evidence.

pleiades.why: Considerate tone keeps minds open during critique and adoption.

sirius.why: Pedagogy-by-framework: teaches right reasoning via clear protocols.

andromeda.why: Refuses propaganda capture; keeps opinion sovereign under projection.

arcturus.why: Cast as ‘fix everyone’s thinking’ → burnout/scapegoat when nuance resists.

draco.why: Authority aura invites rank tests and access policing in debates.

lyra.why: Clear, resonant delivery sets a cultural tone for rational discourse.

orion-dark.why: Doctrine capture: enforcing orthodoxy to preserve image/control.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—stand by evidence, not applause.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: models ethical critique despite crowd pressure.

andromeda.why: Loosens mental control in the collective—frees discourse from dogma.

arcturus.why: Elder logic: maintains standards of evidence, review, and periodic return to source.

draco.why: Legacy status can drift into gatekeeping of ‘who is truly rational.’

orion-dark.why: Turning method into immutable canon—hierarchy over inquiry.

orion-light.why: Elder ordeal: hold intellectual courage and humility simultaneously.

pleiades.why: Focus is standards of thought, not bonding/soothing.

sirius.why: Insight sage—teaches the law of sound rationalization by embodied example.
